cast.name: 粲儿·金多鲁克 Caner Cindoruk
德雅·萍娜·阿克 Derya Pinar Ak
奥努尔·塞伊特·亚兰 Onur Seyit Yaran
约紫葛.约兹达尔 Özge Özder

introduction: Sevgi Ersoy (Şevval Sam), a famous TV presenter whose career is on the decline, suddenly marries Fikret Alabey (Caner Cindoruk), one of the country's leading businessmen. This unexpected marriage shocks everyone. Both Sevgi and Fikret have had unhappy marriages in the past. They now want to live out their second chances, but it won't be easy. Their marriage means their very different families will come together. The cohabitation of these two very different families under one roof will create bigger problems than Sevgi and Fikret anticipated, changing the lives of all family members, especially their children, Taylan (Onur Seyit Yaran) and Şelale (Derya Pınar Ak), who are forced to live in adjacent rooms.
